title: CISA Alerts of Control Web Panel Command Injection Flaw Actively Exploited

content.raw: The Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency has issued an urgent alert about a critical command-injection vulnerability in Control Web Panel that is currently being actively exploited in the wild. Tracked as CVE-2025-48703, this flaw poses a significant threat to organizations running the popular server management platform and demands immediate attention from system administrators worldwide.
